Data_details: The species are named with reference to the Leipzig Catalogue of vascular plants (https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-020-00702-z).

Description: ID combining the species and the botanic garden
Data_details: First three letters of the genus, the species, if needed the subspecies and the botanic garden. For a few exceptions where the first three letters of two genus would be the same, the first four letters were taken.

Description: Date of data recording tranformed in the day of the year.
Observation of initial growth, first appearance of a new shoot aboveground.
Data_details: "y" indicates that this species showed initital growth, "no" indicates that this species showed no initial growth, "m" indicates that the observations is missing for this date and "u" indicates that the observer was not sure whether initial growth could be observed or not.

Description: Observation of unfolding of young leaves.
Data_details: "y" indicates that this species showed unfolding of young leaves, "no" indicates that this species showed no unfolding of young leaves, "m" indicates that the observations is missing for this date and "u" indicates that the observer was not sure whether young leaves are unfoldet or not.

Description: Observation of unfolding of open flowers.
Data_details: "y" indicates that this species showed open flowers, "no" indicates that this species showed no open flowers, "m" indicates that the observations is missing for this date and "u" indicates that the observer was not sure whether floweres are open or not.

Description: The proportion of observed open flowers in relation to the total number of flowering buds and fruits.

Data_details: "y" indicates that this species had ripe fruits, "no" indicates that this species had no ripe fruits, "m" indicates that the observations is missing for this date and "u" indicates that the observer was not sure whether fruits were ripe or not.

"y" indicates that this species had senescent leaves, "no" indicates that this species showed no senescent leaves, "m" indicates that the observations is missing for this date and "u" indicates that the observer was not sure whether senescent leaves were senescent or not.

Description: The percentage of senescent leaves in relation to the whole vegetative biomass.
Information about maintenance practice. For more information see the PhenObs protocol (https://doi.org/10.1111/1365-2435.13747).
Important notes which are useful when analysing the data.
